Protocols/Addable.html#/s:ZFP14SDGMathem.abstract: Returns the sum, concatenation, or the result of a similar operation on two values implied by the “+” symbol. Exact behaviour depends on the type.

Protocols/PointType.html#/s:ZFP14SDGMath.abstract: Returns the point arrived at by starting at the point on the left and moving according to the vector on the right.

Protocols/Measurement.html.name: Measurement
Protocols/Measurement.html.abstract: A type that represents a measurement that can be expressed in various units.

Protocols/OneDimensionalPoint.html.name: OneDimensionalPoint

Protocols/OneDimensionalVector.html.abstract: A one‐dimensional value that can be used with ×(:) and ÷(::) in conjunction with a scalar.
